meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling an umbo or boss.
meanings.sent1: The umbonal shape of the rock made it easy to distinguish from the others.
meanings.sent2: The artist used umbonal patterns to decorate the vase.
meanings.sent3: The umbonal design on the cake looked like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her umbrella had an umbonal tip that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The umbonal texture of the fabric felt rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the highest point of a shell.
meanings.sent1: The umbonal part of the seashell was the most colorful.
meanings.sent2: She collected shells with unique umbonal markings.
meanings.sent3: The umbonal spot on the shell seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The umbonal peak of the shell resembled a tiny hill.
meanings.sent5: The umbonal edge of the shell was sharp to the touch.
